description.en:
Batoto Scans :
“You’re so wet even though it’s morning. If you don’t wake up, I’ll attack you ok?”

“Oh no!”

Komaki and Tasuku are newlyweds spending their time being lovey-dovey. Whether it's day or night, they can’t help but want each other.

But there’s a secret Tasuku can’t tell Komaki. He used to be a host!!! In order to maintain his innocent image, he tries not to use the techniques he got from being a host, pretending to be a virgin.

On the other hand, Komaki also has a secret. She used to be Tasuku’s stalker! Can she keep this a secret from her husband, the man she’s always loved?

This is the love of 2 people trying to hide their past.
